                      int gameID)
               throws TooManyPlayersException,
                      MatchAlreadyStartedException,
                      PlayerAlreadyExistsException,
                      PlayerNotExistsException

      • hostMatch

        public void hostMatch​(PlayerConnection host,
                      int maxPlayers,
                      int maxDeaths,
                      int turnDuration,
                      int mapID)
               throws TooManyMatchesException,
                      TooManyPlayersException,
                      PlayerNotExistsException,
                      MatchAlreadyStartedException,
                      PlayerAlreadyExistsException
        Allow to join a game while in the lobby
        Parameters:
        host - connection object of player hosting the game
        maxPlayers - in the game
        maxDeaths - in the game
        turnDuration - in the game
        mapID - of the map to play (between 1 and 4)
        Throws:
        TooManyMatchesException
        TooManyPlayersException
        PlayerNotExistsException
        MatchAlreadyStartedException
        PlayerAlreadyExistsException
